document.full_text: late author michael crichton, whose novels have been adapted into movies such as "jurassic park," will have a new posthumous novel "micro" published on november 22, publisher harpercollins said on monday.
document.title: michael crichton posthumous novel to be published
lines_and_colors: late author michael crichton, whose novels have been adapted into movies such as "jurassic park," will have a new posthumous novel "micro" published on november 22, publisher harpercollins said on monday.
